Goal Representation: ['1. Identify and place the pants on the ironing board.  ', '2. Iron the pants to remove wrinkles.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select the ironing board
        
        bind pants: item where:
            is_clothes_pants(pants)
        # Select the pants to be ironed
        
        achieve close_char(char, ironing_board)
        # Move the character closer to the ironing board
        
        achieve_on(pants, ironing_board)
        # Place the pants on the ironing board
